    • Constructor Detail

      • Navigation

        public Navigation(Odometer odom,
          BTSend sender,
          UltrasonicSensor bot,
          ColorSensor cs,
          ObjectRecognition or)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        odom - The shared odometer
        sender - The bluetooth class that sends signals to the master brick
        bot - The bottom ultrasonic sensor
        cs - The color sensor used for object detection and recognition
        or - The object recognition class that computes light readings

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Controls the flow of execution in the Navigation class
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
            double y)
        Will travel to the input x and y coordinates while checking for obstacles. Correct's it's orientation if the angle difference is large enough.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position to travel to
        y - The y position to travel to

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double angle,
          boolean stop,
          boolean corner)
        Turn to the absolute angle given with 2 levels of accuracy
        Parameters:
        angle - The absolute angle to turn to
        stop - True if the robot should stop spinning after turning
        corner - True if the robot should turn with higher accuracy, used for turning on point to new location

      • scan

        public void scan()
        Will stop and scan 180 degrees in an attempt to detect objects

      • inspect

        public void inspect(double angle,
           int distance)
        Will drive the given distance at the given angle and check the color of an object
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle to drive at
        distance - The distance the object was sensed at

      • capture

        public void capture()
        Assumes a blue block is in front of the robot, will reverse, lower claw, and grab and lift the block

        public void avoid(double i)
        Recursive obstacle avoidance that returns once the robot is successfully around the obstacle
        Parameters:
        i - The iteration of recursion
